name: Pulse Space
description: Pulse is developing scalable on-demand power and space situational awareness services (ssa) in orbit. This optimizes power systems and operator capabilities while addressing orbital debris to ensure a cleaner space environment.
one_liner: Pulse is developing scalable on-demand power and space situational awareness services (ssa) in orbit. This optimizes power systems and operator capabilities while addressing orbital debris to ensure a cleaner space environment.
